respackopts.dumpFailed: Could not dump the requested resource, look at your log for details
respackopts.jfconfig.debugLogs.tooltip: Logs some information useful for debugging packs or the mod itself. (requires restart)
respackopts.jfconfig.generateNames.toolt: Automatically generate names when a resource pack does not provide one
respackopts.jfconfig.ioLogs.tooltip: Log every resource access. WARNING: This WILL result in giant log files!
respackopts.jfconfig.title: Respackopts
respackopts.jfconfig.validationLayer.too: Enable the validation layer to automatically detect some types of problems
respackopts.loadError: There is an issue with the resource pack configs. Please take a look at the game log
respackopts.reloadFailed: Could not reload all resources, look at your log for details
respackopts.versionText: Version %s using the respackopts meta version %s
